Description.Text: Novotel Yekaterinburg Centre is a modern 4-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Ekaterinburg. Highlights include a gym, steam room, free Wi-Fi and free parking. Ekaterinburg city centre is situated besides the Iset River and steeped in fascinating history. Nearby places of interest include City Hall, the Opera & Ballet House and the Cathedral-on-the-Blood, the site of the former Ipatiev House where the Romanov royal family spent their last months. Geologicheskaya metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Ekaterinburg destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a minimalist facade. Facilities include a gym, steam room and a gift shop. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with neutral and earth tones. They feature a sitting area with a sofa. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, safe, mini-bar and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Olive Brasserie offers Mediterranean and Russian cuisine in a modern dining room. Guests can also enjoy live music and a range of drinks, snacks and desserts at the casual 24-hour Olive Lounge. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
